attributes.action: Withdraw all MP's expeses and additional benifits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The fact that MP's claim for living costs is appauling. Every other working man or woman must pay out of their own wages to fund housing, or in most MP's cases, luxury items, and a general lifestyle.

MP's should be paid a single flat wage and live from that. If an £60K+ a year wage is not sufficent for a person to live on, the how can the average working person live on half of that.

Setting an example in Government positions is key to trust and belief.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
